data.name: Photoelektric
data.detailed_description:
Photoelektric is an atmospheric, VR platformer experience. Using physics-based movement control scheme, you will illuminate your path though a 3-dimensional world by solving puzzles and avoiding enemies.

Features:
  • Immerse yourself in a fluid, neon-soaked sci-fi environment
  • Enjoy a low-gravity, free movement control scheme designed for maximum comfort
  • Interact with photonic control panels and machinery to find your path through the world
  • Solve physics-based puzzles - controlling your body's momentum is part of the challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
